availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Yazell (Mason County, Kentucky resident)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky resident. Kentucky native. Son of Simpson Yazell and Neoma Janes Yazell. Resident of Fleming County in 1850. Resident of Mason County, Kentucky, in 1860

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Division 2, p. 400. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, East Maysville, p. 163. Find A Grave, "James Yazell (1844-1898)," Memorial #22406273, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=22406273 (accessed June 17, 2017). KYR-0001-029-0573.
